Context: George Brown College ranked eighth in overall research income among Canadian colleges for 2021. The college ranked fourth for the number of paid students and completed projects. Last year, more than 1,000 students had opportunities to work with industry partners on real-world problems. Some research projects during the 2020/21 academic year focused on improving mental health of seniors in long-term care homes, promoting accessibility in the workforce, and empowering community members to reshape their living spaces. For more information about research opportunities and innovation at George Brown College, visit their website or sign up for updates. Contact George Brown College via phone at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Visit their social media hub for more information. Please note that the information on this website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered a representation or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
